title: Healing Handpan - 25 Min Handpan Music for Deep Focus | Pravos Sessions
description:
Experience Healing Handpan - a 25-minute handpan journey designed for deep focus and restorative work.

I built Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) to bring flow into work. The kind of unbroken attention I experienced in meditation and yoga, but applied to coding, writing, and creative work.

This album features the hypnotic, healing tones of handpan drums. It follows the same intentional arc as all Pravos music - grounding, rising, sustaining, returning - but with a particularly meditative quality.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
